text.__SUMMARY__: Nepenthes × mirabilata (; a blend of mirabilis and alata) is a natural hybrid involving N. alata and N. mirabilis.N. × mirabilata was mentioned as a natural hybrid in Guide to Nepenthes Hybrids (1995).  The hybrid is restricted to Mindanao, the Philippines, the only location where the parent species overlap.
text.References:
McPherson, S.R. & V.B. Amoroso 2011. Field Guide to the Pitcher Plants of the Philippines. Redfern Natural History Productions, Poole.
CP Database: Nepenthes × mirabilata
